tgt_original: vigatā asavaḥ prāṇā yasya sa vyasurmṛtakaḥ,
uṣṇā gauryasya sa uṣṇaguḥ sūryastasya bimbe maṇḍale mṛtakahṛdayagatasūryamaṇḍala ityarthaḥ |
kṛta eva bāhyāyāmarcanavidhiḥ sukhodayo yena sa tathā |  urukaruṇa iti |
prabhāsvarānmanonirmitaṃ ca tadari tridalacakraṃ ceti nirmitāri dharmodayā ,
vigrahavatīṃ sahajarūpiṇīṃ pūrvapratipāditāṃ pūrvatantre śrīsaṃvarārṇavādau bhagavatpratipāditāṃ vā |
kṛtabāhyārcanavidhiriti |  kṛta eva bāhye darpaṇatale arcanavidhiryena sa tathā |  urukaruṇa iti |  ururmahatī karuṇā kṛpā yasya |
bibhrāṇāṃ vāmadoṣṇā kamalamatisitaṃ raktapūrṇadhvajāḍhayāṃ  kālyā dambholikālyā parigataśirasaṃ muktamūrdhvotthahastām ||2 ||  bhāvanāmāha-sandhyetyādi |
sandhyāsindūrayoriva varṇo yasyāḥ suviśuddharāgamayītvāt ,  tāṃ dhyāyādityanuvartanīyam |
kharakaretyādi |  kharastīkṣṇaḥ karanikaro raśmisamūhastena apāstā nirākṛtā saptārkasya saptasūryasya kāntiryayā sā tathā |  punaḥ kiṃbhūtāṃ kartrīṃ vidhātrīṃ sarvārtihantrīmiti |
punaḥ kiṃbhūtāṃ kamalaṃ biṃbhrāṇāṃ kapālaṃ dhārayantīm |
nirātmakatvāt khalu dharmadhātorviśuddhitaḥ suptaśavo vimānaḥ |  anālayaṃ tat suviśuddharūpaṃ pratītaye (yate)  tadhṛdaye śavasya ||
mukhagaladasṛjamiti |  mukhātpadmamukhād galadasṛg raktaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā |
sa ca ṣaṭprakāraḥ |  svāda eva ṣaḍeva gāvaścakṣūṃṣi yasyāḥ sā tathā |
varaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ subhagaṃ manoharaṃ manāk īṣat krodhameva mūlaṃ pradhānamānanaṃ mukham,
anyanmukhaṃ śūkaramukhaṃ ca yasyāḥ sā tathā |
etā eva bhasmaparihāreṇa devyāḥ pañcamudrā boddhavyā ityāmnāyaḥ |
prajñādhṛg yena cakre śirasi dhṛtamidaṃ śukravairāgyasaukhya-
varāṅgīmiti sakalasukumārādiślādhyayauvanaguṇopetatvāt ||3 ||  jñānākarṣādividhiṃ prāgiva kṛtvā vidhānavinmantrī |  svastikamalikābhimukhaṃ bhramantamekaṃ drutaṃ dhyāyāt ||4 ||
mudrāabhirmudritāṅgīmiti |  mudrābhiḥ kaṇṭhikā-rucaka-kuṇḍala-śiromaṇi-yajñopavītasvarūpapañcamudrābhiḥ sāṃvarībhiḥ samyag mudritamaṅgaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā |
alamivālaṃ daṃṣṭrā tadasyāstītyalikaṃ mastakaṃ tadabhimukham |  athavā vajraḍāke "
trikūṭagirigahvara iti |  trikoṇatvāt trikūṭaṃ durārohatvāt prapātabhūtatvācca giristasya gahvare'
tasyārthaḥ-sukharūpiṇyā devyā saha nandayatīti nandī binduḥ |
tasya ca caṇḍālīsaṅgamādāvartānnandyāvarta iti |  bhramantamityavicchinnaṃ kulālacakravad bhramantam |
bhramat prāguktamiveti |  yathā sindūrapātasamaye śikhikoṭikaṃ likhitaṃ tathaivetyarthaḥ |
tadeva cakra mativegādatiśayitacalanāt sthiramiva niścalamiva dhyāyāt |
atropadeśaḥ- anantaraślokasthitapaścācchabdotthapaścādityaparakriyāpadāccakrabhāvanānantaraṃ caṇḍālīrūpaṃ nirvātaniṣkampadīpamiva dīptaṃ niścalapradīpavad dedīpyamānaṃ paśyediti boddhavyam |
etannirvātaniṣkampadīpamivetyādyavyabhicāraviśeṣaṇadīptaśabdasya punaruktasyopādānācca bhagavatyāścaṇḍālyā evaṃrūpasya sakalamavikalaṃ napuṃsakaśabdena viśeṣaṇamityāmnāyavidaḥ |
anyathā saṃvṛtipakṣe caṇḍālīdarśanameva na syāt ,  anuktatvāt |
dvayamapyasaṃpradāyamiti tad vyākhyānaṃ parihṛtyocyate kiṃbhūtaṃ caṇḍālīrūpaṃ drāvayat uru mahat sukhacakraṃ drāvayat drutāpannaṃ kurvat |  sravadamṛtāsārakṛtasavanamiti |
jājvalyamānamiti prakāśamayatvāt |  saditi śobhanamanupamasukhayogāt ||5 ||  tat sthiramivātivegānnirvātaniṣkampadīpamiva dīptam |
amitā anavacchinnā śātasya sukhasya santatiryasmāt tat tathā |
paścānmukha iti |  paścimābhimukha eva devīṃ bhāvayediti niyamaḥ |
paścānnirmāṇacakrād vakārarūpiṇīṃ devīmindubindusthitanādarūparekhayā ūrdhvaṃ gacchantīṃ yāvadevoktaviśeṣaṇasahitāṃ bhāvayedityāmnāyaḥ |

sā ca rekhārūpiṇī bhagavatī cakratrayasamudbhede mahāsukharūpamāsādya mahāsukhamayaṃ svastikaṃ praveśya mahāsukhacakraṃ gatvā mahājvālāvalīvilīnasacchidraghaṭaghṛtenevānavaratasravadamṛtadraveṇātmānaṃ snāpayan sphuṭamevācintyapade viśramediti viśeṣaḥ |
vyākhyānāntare tu caṇḍālyāḥ prathamamevoktatvāt cakrasyaiva viśeṣaṇametad boddhavyam |
paścād mahā sukhacakraṃ bhāvayet drutāpannaṃ kārayet paśyet |
yadvā jagadvayāpi ceti jagadvayāpi jagato'  pi tatsvarūpatvāt |
ananuṣṭhānāttu śrāvakāṇāmiva mahāyānayāyināmapi samūlameva sarvamālūnaṃ viśīrṇam | tathā ca-
dhārāpāte'pi ca girerjvālāśaktiśca vaṃ-bhavā |  āvartaśaktirjvālāyā mahārāgauṣadhīvadhūḥ ||
tatra ca śrīmati caṇḍālīyoge sakalaśaktinidhāne guruvākyādiṣu saṃyogaśaktisamutpāditaviśiṣṭarāgavat ,
maithuneṣu dampatīprītiśaktisamutpāditasatprasavavat ,  kṣīrādiṣu dhārāpātaśaktisamutpāditasāravat ,  navanīteṣu jvālāśaktisamutpāditaviśiṣṭasāravat ,
mantrālīmiva mananāttrāṇānmantrākṣaraṃ vilikha bījam  kāñcanaśalākayaiva sphuṭamavadhūtyā suśobhanayā ||
prīteyaṃ kiravaktrā yadyapi sindūrapātato mukure |  adhyātmarūpadevīpūjā śreṣṭhā tathāpīha ||
mūlānane triṇetreyaṃ traikālyekṣaṇaśuddhitaḥ |  kolānane triṇetreyaṃ satyābhyāṃ tulyadarśanāt ||
manākkrodhaṃ mukhaṃ devyāḥ sausthityā subhagaṃ varam ||
raktapūrṇaṃ dhṛtaṃ vāme bindorvāmapravāhataḥ ||  khe nāḍayāṃ tuṅgata iti khaṭvāṅgaṃ bindurucyate |
mukuramiva nirmalatare cetasi rāgaṃ viśuddhamiva bhujagabhavam |
nimīlyāpi dṛśaṃ paśyannabhaḥ sa na vilohitam |
pratidivasaṃ pratisandhyaṃ yathākṣaṇaṃ vā vibhāvayedetat |  yāvatsiddhinimittaṃ tāvadidaṃ tūcyate vyaktam ||8 ||  kadā bhāvayedityāha-pratidivasamityādi |
evaṃ pratisandhyaṃ sandhyācatuṣṭaye |  yathākṣaṇaṃ vā yathāvasaram |
yāvat siddhinimittamiti |  yāvat siddhinimittaṃ nopajāyate tāvadityarthaḥ |
idaṃ tūcyate vyaktamiti |  idaṃ punarvyaktameva nimittamucyate ,
iti dambholikīrājī rājate śirasi sthitā ||  ūrdhvaṃ binduḥ sahā'
svapne'pi nidrāyāmapi dhyānavato yogadharasyācirādevānuttarā siddhiḥ syāt |
pakṣāntare tu piturvajradharasya vanaṃ vijanatvāt ,  rāgāṭavītvācca mahāsukham |
giriḥ prapātasthānatvāt kamalakiñjalkaṃ tasya kuñje koṣacarmapihitatvāt tadgarbhe |  vṛkṣamūlādau |  "kṛṣū vṛṣū secane "
sicyate bodhicittaṃ dhārayatīti vṛkṣaḥ kuliśamavadhūtī vā ,
ajastramityanavarataṃ yathā bhavati ||11 ||  siddhau vasudhādīnāṃ bhavati layo hyuttarottare kramaśaḥ |
asya yogasya siddhau vasudhādīnāṃ pṛthivyādimahābhūtānāṃ layo bhavati |
uttarottare kramaśa iti |  uttaramuttarakrameṇa līyate ityarthaḥ | tathā ca-
yadvā vāmadakṣiṇanāḍīvāhagatāni pṛthivyādīni maṇḍalasvabhāvāni pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabmaṇḍalaṃ yātītyevaṃ kramato yāvadakṣayasukhasvarūpaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ praviśantīti |
pṛthvī toyaṃ prayāti jvalanamapi jalaṃ pāvako mārutaṃ ca
vāyuḥ śūnyaṃ ca śūnyaṃ vrajati daśavidhaṃ vai nimittaṃ nimittam |
tadā yoginaḥ kathamiva prakāśata ityāha- khyāti tadā gaganābhamiti |
niṣkaluṣaṃ talavilīnabāṣpakramavyapagamasaṃprāptanijarūpaṃ darpaṇavannirmalaṃ tādṛśi jñānadarpaṇa iva bāṣpaṃ viśvameva layamāpadyata ityarthaḥ
jñānakāraṇamāha- jānīyādityādi |  tajjñānaṃ cihnairvakṣyamāṇairjānīyāditi sambandhaḥ |  cihnāni tviti |
pṛthvī kāṭhinyamabdhātuḥ snehatāṃ teja uṣṇatām |  pavanaṃ preraṇāṃ muñcan bodhāmbhodhau nimajjati ||
cihnāni nimittāni punaḥ pañcadhā pañcaprakārāṇi tajjñāstadadvaitayogajñā vidurjānanti ,
ākāśāsaktacittairanimiṣanayanairvajramārgaṃ praviṣṭaiḥ  śūnyād dhūmo marīciḥ prakaṭavimalakhadyota eva pradīpaḥ |
ṣaḍaṅge ca tatra gurūpadeśenākāśe prathamaṃ yogī dhūmaṃ paśyati na marīcikāmiti svānubhavato jñeyaṃ tato marīcikāḥ |
sarvajñahetukaṃ taddhi siddhinikaṭe pravartakam |  paścānmāyopamākāraṃ svapnākāraṃ kṣaṇātkṣaṇam ||iti |
yadvā mṛgatṛṣṇābhamiti |  viśvameva yogino marīcikeva mithyā |
manaseti |  dhyānāgracetasaivānyavijñānānāmaviṣayatvāt ||13 ||  prathamaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇābhaṃ dhūmākāraṃ dvitīyakaṃ cihnam |  khadyotavattṛtīyaṃ turyaṃ dīpojjvalaṃ spaṣṭam ||14 ||
khadyotavaditi |  yathā khadyotaḥ khe ākāśe kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dyotate ,
tathaiva sphuṭāsphuṭabhāvena śūnyatāyāṃ jñānajyotirālambana iti tṛtīyaṃ cihnam |
dīpavadujjvalaṃ caturthaṃ cihnam |  yadvā dīpavadujjvalaṃ spaṣṭaṃ vyaktam |
vigatābhragaganasadṛśaṃ pañcamaṃ cihnaṃ prakāśamavikalpam |  evaṃ labdhanimitto mudrāṃ mahatīmavāpnoti ||15 ||
evamiti |  evaṃ krameṇotpannajñānanimitto yogī mudamānandaṃ rāti gṛhṇātīti mudrā ,
māyāgajaḥ pratītyasamutpanno niḥsvabhāva iti viśvameva pratītyajaṃ pratibhāsamātraṃ rūpaṃ dhūmavat paśyatītyarthaḥ |
kartavyāntaramāha- utthātukāma ityādi |  utthātukāmo yogī utthāya kṛtyaṃ vidadhīteti sambandhaḥ |  kiṃkṛtvetyāha-praṇipatya yoginīmiti |
kṛtyamapi kurvan bhāvakaḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhatītyāha- tiṣṭhedityādi |  yogayugena mudrādvayayogena sadaiva tiṣṭhannivaset ,  sacakrāṃ devīṃ caṇḍālīṃ ca bhāvayannityarthaḥ |
